nhost env ls
------------

Fetch env vars from remote

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


List your environment variables stored on remote.

::

  nhost env ls [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for ls

      --config string     config file (default is $HOME/.nhost.yaml)
